src.ui package¶

Submodules¶

src.ui.dashboard module¶

Just run using python dashboard.py

src.ui.dashboard.make_hist_plot(fields, bar_width)[source]¶

Histogram plot callback

Parameters:
  • fields – content of dropdown menu
  • bar_width – value of slider
Returns:

plotly figure
src.ui.dashboard.make_second_explore_plot(categorical: list, continuous, plot)[source]¶

Make a plot based on the categorical and continuous data selected. Choose a box plot or frequency plot depending on the plot selected.

Parameters:
  • categorical – list of data categories
  • continuous – single continuous data field
  • plot – “frequency plot” or “box plot”
Returns:

plotly figure
src.ui.dashboard.make_sunburst(fields, color_var)[source]¶

Callback to generate the sunburst figure based on the selected categorical input fields and the desired continuous variable, used to color the segments.

Parameters:
  • color_var – The continuous variable with which to color the segments
  • fields – Categorical data fields with which to size segments by frequency
Returns:

plotly figure
src.ui.dashboard.populate_dropdown(category: str) → List[dict][source]¶

Generate a list of dictionaries to use to populate the dropdown menues :param category: ‘continuous’ or ‘categorical’ :return: a list of dicts with keys ‘label’ and ‘value’

src.ui.dashboard.toggle_modal(n1, n2, n3, is_open)[source]¶
